page.title: 02Bicycle Motocross
page.content: The sport of BMX originated way back in 1969 when a group of children, who liked the sport of motocross but couldn't afford to take part, started racing their pedal bikes on dirt.The first ever organised race was held in Palms Park,Santa Monica,USA.In 1973 the first BMX Championship was held by Scott Breithaupt at Long Beach California.The sport continued to grow rapidly.In 1973 the first real BMX bike was manufactured.More tracks appeared and a body was set up to organise race meetings throughout the USA, eventually coming to Britain in the spring of1980.One of the first meetings in the U.K.was held at Cleethorpes.The track consisted of wooden jumps in a field. More tracks were built and more products appeared on the market.
